• If HIV p ositive and viral load unknown, or on ART for <4 weeks; start oxytocin with membranes intact, or use

• Oxytocin, IV infusion, 2 units in 200 mL sodium chloride 0.9%.
o Start at an infusion rate of 12 mL/hour (i.e. 2 milliunits/minute). If absent or inadequate contractions,
increase infusion rate according to the Table 9-1.
ACTIONS WHEN Cervix clinically favourable:
